article_title: All central Ohio hospitals give discounts for ‘self pay’ patients
article_text:
Total Access

Enjoy the convenience of home delivery plus Digital D. Sign up for our BEST VALUE today!

article_metadata.description: Central Ohio residents who lack health insurance and pay their own way for health care no longer must pay full “retail” prices at local hospitals under any circumstances.
